AzureBlade: I swear it upon the honor of my spark. You must be 
wondering where you are, right? Or what I am doing here?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., HanaKirei85@a... wrote:
> Mistra had heard the noise of something or other coming...and 
damaging some 
> of the forest as he went. Her ears flew back, eyes darting to and 
fro 
> nervously as a normal wolf would do..although she didn't run. Merely 
backed 
> up until her hind legs bumped into the status pod...she would defend 
it if 
> she had to. Even if it did mean nothing...
> 
> A high pitched squealing drew her attention for a split second as a 
small 
> flock of bats flew from the cave, afraid of danger. Frankly, she 
didn't blame 
> them...but they were natural creatures of this world. Unlike 
herself. She had 
> to defend what she had. Still, she couldn't help but smirk for a 
split 
> second. So...it seemed that's where part of her beast form had come 
from. All 
> the more unnatural...but she rather liked it.
> 
> Quickly, her attention was drawn back to the forest as she heard 
someone 
> approach, almost swearing she could smell them. Her wings were 
raised, in an 
> effort to make herself look more menacing should this person be an 
enemy, 
> fangs beared. And then, he emerged. A dragon like creature. 
Like...herself? 
> Was he?
> 
> <<> After some moments walking in the forest, he saw a cave. He had 
> > damaged some trees accidentally, so he knew he would be waited 
for.
> > 
> > AzureBlade: Greetings, my friend. I am AzureBlade, and I truly 
come in 
> > peace.>>
> 
> Her bat wings lowered somewhat, fangs no longer beared...although 
she was 
> still ready to defend herself should she have to. Even if she stood 
no chance 
> against the much larger bot (or he at least seemed large to her by 
this 
> point). Crystal blue eyes uncertain, she replied "G-greetings...I am 
called 
> Mistra..." She considered, then added as an afterthought more 
quickly "I 
> think." Calming herself, her wings lowered a bit more "You...swear 
to me you 
> mean no harm?"
